usefulItems: baking tray (30 x 40 cm), baking paper, silicone spatula, oven
title: Patatas Bravas with Chorizo

ingredients.content: ½ - 1 fresh red chilli, deseeded if preferred and halved
¼ - ½ tsp fine sea salt, to taste
800 - 850 g small potatoes, peeled and cut in pieces (2-3 cm)

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 200°C. Line a baking tray (30 x 40 cm) with baking paper and set aside.
Place onions, oil, garlic and chilli in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula, then sauté <b>3 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.

Add tinned tomatoes, cayenne pepper, paprika and salt. Place Varoma dish into position and weigh potatoes into it. Secure Varoma lid and cook <b>20 min/100°C/speed 1<b>. Set Varoma aside and insert measuring cup, then blend <b>30 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer sauce into a bowl and cover to keep warm.

Place potatoes onto prepared baking tray and top with sliced chorizo. Bake for 15 minutes (200°C). Remove from oven and stir potatoes and chorizo to ensure even cooking. Return tray to the oven and bake for a further 25-30 minutes (200°C), or until potatoes are golden and chorizo is sizzling.
Transfer potatoes and chorizo into a serving bowl and serve sauce warm on the side.

hintsAndTricks: This is a classic tapas dish served throughout Spain. Enjoy as the start to a Tapas themed menu or simply as a nibble at your next party.
